mapper.sql: apply_id, apply_time, apply_for, apply_by, approve_by, `status`, note
mapper.select: SELECT va.name,category,site,apply_time as applyTime,activity_apply.status as status, activity_apply.note as note,u.name as approveBy,apply_by as applyBy FROM activity_apply LEFT JOIN published_activity pa on pa.publish_id = activity_apply.apply_for LEFT JOIN volunteer_activity va on pa.belong_to = va.activity_id LEFT JOIN USER u on u.id = apply_by WHERE apply_by = #{volunteerId}

SELECT activity_apply.apply_id as applyId,va.name as name,category,apply_time as applyTime, u.birthday,u.tel,u.name as userName,apply_by as applyBy FROM activity_apply LEFT JOIN published_activity pa on pa.publish_id = activity_apply.apply_for LEFT JOIN volunteer_activity va on pa.belong_to = va.activity_id LEFT JOIN USER u on u.id = apply_by WHERE activity_apply.status = 0
